title: Flight- No flight shall contain more than 12 risers, but in residential buildings, in narrow plots a single flight staircase may be permitted
clause_text: Flight- No flight shall contain more than 12 risers, but in residential buildings, in narrow plots a single flight staircase may be permitted.
